name: golden_07_healing_potion
prompt: create a healing potion that restores my health when I drink it

verify.code: () => { const items = window.__VOXEL_GAME__.itemFactory.itemTypes; const potion = Object.values(items).find(i => i.name.toLowerCase().includes('heal') || i.name.toLowerCase().includes('potion')); return potion ? { success: true } : { success: false }; }
